metadata.synopsis: A random combat was dragged up to Lae'zel Recruitment (bandits, brains, etc.); Lae'zel is still in the cage. She says  this AD only once, after a player's turn.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Let me down, and I'll show you true might!

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Let me down, and we will prove our people's might!
